text: tatha allaah ke lie jihaad karo, jaise jihaad karana[1] chaahie. useene tumhen nirvaachit kiya hai aur nahin banaee tumapar dharm mein koee sankeernata (tangee). ye tumhaare pita ibraaheem ka dharm hai, useene tumhaara naam muslim rakha hai, is (quraan) se pahale tatha isamen bhee. taaki rasool gavaah hoon tumapar aur tum gavaah[2] bano sab logon par. atah namaaz kee sthaapana karo tatha zakaat do aur allaah ko sudrdh pakad[3] lo. vahee tumhaara sanrakshak hai. to vah kya hee achchha sanrakshak tatha kya hee achchha sahaayak hai
